name: Mon nozou
description:
Complete new game Canceled!!

so that's a lot of bugs right now

its name  "Mon nozou"  it's a bit of a copy of Mon bazou

What's new in the new update (v0.1)

i have added a main menu/About/Settings/Exit/Play

What's new in the new update (v0.2)

you can now spawn cars

you can buy a car

i have added a main menu in the game you can General/Controls/audio/Credits/Exit/back to start screen

i found a bug if you go into Main menu in game and press "Main Menu(start screen)" and you press play you might stuck but you just need to press ESC and you are free

Comment if you find any bugs
